mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password_hash, real_name, emp_no AS empNo, gender, title, department, phone, email, hire_date AS hireDate, remark, role, status, created_at, updated_at FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, username, password_hash, real_name, emp_no AS empNo, gender, title, department, phone, email, hire_date AS hireDate, remark, role, status, created_at, updated_at FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user(username, password_hash, real_name, emp_no, gender, title, department, phone, email, hire_date, remark, role, status, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{realName}, #{empNo}, #{gender}, #{title}, #{department}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{hireDate}, #{remark}, #{role}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_user SET password_hash = #{passwordHash}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE sys_user SET real_name = #{realName}, emp_no = #{empNo}, gender = #{gender}, title = #{title}, department = #{department}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, hire_date = #{hireDate}, remark = #{remark}, role = #{role}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
